publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2854 Bristow Muldoon on behalf of the Local Government and Transport Committee: 4th Report 2005 (Session 2) of the Local Government and Transport Committee, Inquiry into Issues arising from the Transport (Scotland) Act 2001—That the Parliament notes the recommendations contained in the Local Government and Transport Committee’s 4th Report 2005 (Session 2): Inquiry into issues arising from the Transport (Scotland) Act 2001 (SP Paper 316). Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S2M-2854 Bristow Muldoon on behalf of the Local Government and Transport Committee:4th Report 2005 (Session 2) of the Local Government and Transport Committee, Inquiry into Issues arising from the Transport (Scotland) Act 2001—That the Parliament notes the recommendations contained in the Local Government and Transport Committee’s 4th Report 2005 (Session 2): Inquiry into issues arising from the Transport (Scotland) Act 2001 (SP Paper 316).
